TermDefinition.DefinitionText: The tumor was completely removed by surgery and all of the following are true: (1) cancer was found only in the kidney and did not spread to blood vessels of the kidney; (2) the outer layer of the kidney did not break open; (3) the tumor did not break open; (4) a biopsy of the tumor was not done; and (5) no cancer cells were found at the edges of the area where the tumor was removed.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage I Wilms tumor"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "tumor de Wilms en estadio I"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: tumor de Wilms en estadio I

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Se extirpó completamente el tumor por medio de cirugía y se presentan las situaciones siguientes: (1) el cáncer se encontró solamente en el riñón y no se disemino hasta los vasos sanguíneos del riñón; 2) la capa externa del riñón no se abrió; (3) el tumor no se abrió; (4) no se hizo una biopsia del tumor, y (5) no se encontraron células cancerosas en los bordes del área de donde se extirpó el tumor.
